rdf:type:
Organization of data will be based on:
(a) creating collections, or stacks, of cards,
(b) creating links between cards, and
(c) a plug-in framework that allows new card types with arbitrary internal structure (fields) to be introduced

The cards I use here have id, card-type, title, body text and tags fields. For new card types, only the id and card-type are required, and may be hidden.
